item.description:
Turning the Key: Secrets to Finding Private Money

It doesn't matter if you're a new investor beginning to explore the possibilities or an experienced investor looking to expand your repertoire; why use your own money, or even the bank's money, to finance your real estate investments when you can use one of the best sources out there for funding?

Private Money, sometimes known as "Other People's Money" or even "OPM", is one of the most underused sources of financing; even though it's what the pros use when picking up properties, OPM often gets overlooked by investors because it's not always easy to get.

This month's speaker at Turning the Key, Joseph Roche, will be sharing with us some of his secrets for finding "Private Money" and what you can do to make sure you have more money than deals!

Topics will include:

* Where to find Private Money (It's easier than you might think!)

* How to package and present your deals

* How to avoid getting into legal hot soup when "offering" your deal

* What makes a good Private Money lender (and what makes a BAD one...)

* When NOT to use Private Money


Come join us on Thursday, June 7th for an evening of education and networking.


Pre-Register for Turning the Key and save $5.00!

group.name: Real Estate Networking/Education Meeting in Boston

item.name: Turning the Key: Secrets to Finding Private Money
